Package model.effect

package model.effect
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    model
     
    model.effect.leader
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AtomicExchangeEffect
    The Class AtomicExchangeEffect is strictly related to the ResourcesExchangeEffect.
    CharacterImmediateEffect
    All the CharacterCards activate a flag variable in the bonuses related to a player so they can be considered as "immediate" because what they do is just set a flag when acquired hence when its immediateEffect activates.
    CouncilPrivilegeEffect
    The Class CouncilPrivilegeEffect.
    Effect
    The abstract class Effect, it only has one method: applyEffect
    ForEachResourceTypeEffect
    This effect gives n resources for each m other resources.
    ForEachTypeCardEffect
    This class implements the "Something"ForEachCard effect, this effect gives a specific resource to the associated player.
    HarvestBonusEffect
    The Class HarvestBonusEffect.
    HarvestEffect
    This class implements the harvest effect that gives only resources, hence a resource chest.
    InstantHarvestActionEffect
    The Class InstantHarvestActionEffect.
    InstantProductionActionEffect
    The Class InstantProductionActionEffect.
    InstantResourcesEffect
    This class implements the InstantResourceEffect that gives a certain amount of a certain resource to a player.
    MultipleEffect
    This effect takes two effects and apply them in a row.
    NoEffect
    The Class NoEffect was needed in order not to check if a card's effect is null before applying it
    NoFloorBonusEffect
    The Class NoFloorBonusEffect if applied to a player, the player doesn't get Tower's floors bonuses when he takes a card
    ProductionBonusEffect
    The Class ProductionBonusEffect.
    ProductionEffect
    This class represents the production effect of a building card, it differs from other effects because its actual effect is applied only when a production on the card is activated.
    RaiseValueWithDiscountEffect
    The Class RaiseValueWithDiscountEffect.
    ResourcesExchangeEffect
    The Class ResourcesExchangeEffect represents a type of effect which can be found only in a Building Card and can only be activated when the player activates a production The exchange gives the player the possibility to pay a certain amount of up to three resources type in order to receive a certain amount of up to two resources type This effect also includes the possibility to have a XOR choice on the exchange .
    TakeCardEffect
    The Class TakeCardEffect.
